114.content: WHO IS THE EVIL VILLAIN?
114.title: Evil Villain?

choices: he plans that Blossom will be trapped into a room constantly filled with sweets
he kidnaps her and force feeds her the sweets
1142.content:
it is a few months since the PPGZ defeated HIM and a few things have happened since the glorious thing of finding out that they still have their powers, first off, the light was overpowered buy HIM lost he his way in the process, but luckily for HIM an asteroid (seems right for this prologue/Epilogue) that was headed toward earth slammed into him and is now on earth in hiding. the Power Puff girls Z still defeat the regular monsters albeit they get bored very quickly, and occasionally get a monster that is tough to beat but in the end they are still Tokyo's protectors. but enough about them lets see what HIM is doing

HIM was reading a magazine when he noticed something, ho ho ho I just received a great
idea, the leader, "blossom" as she calls herself, loves sweets so let that make it her downfall. Whohohoho. but I need to plan this carefully I don't want to be trapped in space, again
1142.title: him
